This appendix is an integral part of the ESRS S1 Own workforce and has the same authority as the
other parts of this Standard. It supports the application of the requirements for Disclosure Requirement
ESRS S1-4 for social and human rights matters with examples of disclosures:
Social and human rights matters Examples of actions:
Secure employment Offer permanent contracts to employees with
